about_the_game:
Blast off with three new outfits for the Bombshells. Rama’s come down with a little plague. Joule is ready for the catwalk. Red Card shows off his beach body. Collect ‘em all!

Content included:


  • Rama Geo-Skin
  • Joule Geo-Skin
  • Redcard Geo-Skin
detailed_description:
Blast off with three new outfits for the Bombshells. Rama’s come down with a little plague. Joule is ready for the catwalk. Red Card shows off his beach body. Collect ‘em all!

Content included:

  • Joule Geo-Skin
  • Redcard Geo-Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12288 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 MB available space
